name: cdpq-redis
description: This is a single redis container, which is suited for HA setups. Redis is a popular in-memory data structure store, used as database, cache and message broker.. See documentation for more details: https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/redis
preInstallNotes: It is strongly recommended to use this service with replicas (2) and redis-sentinels (3).
